name: github-oauth
description: You can enable other users to authorize your OAuth app.

scripts.install-deps: concurrently "rm -rf node_modules && npm i" "npm run install-deps-server" "npm run install-deps-client"
scripts.install-deps-server: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && npm i
scripts.install-deps-client: cd frontend/app && rm -rf node_modules && npm i
